metadata.title: CVE-2009-1182 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Multiple buffer overflows in the JBIG2 MMR decoder in Xpdf 3.02pl2 and earlier, CUPS 1.3.9 and earlier, Poppler before 0.10.6, and other products allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF file.

notes.note: jdstrand> CUPS on Ubuntu uses system pdftops (compiled with --disable-pdftops)

criterions.comment: libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.5-1ubuntu2').
